ðŸ“– Summary: The fileserver repository provides a simple way to serve static files and SPAs in Go applications. It enhances file serving with features like ETag header generation for efficient caching and gzip compression to reduce file sizes. The repository offers convenient methods for mounting the file server to existing HTTP routers.
